Title: The Green Inferno
Writer: Eli Roth (screenplay by), Guillermo Amoedo (screenplay by), Eli Roth (story by)
Actors: Lorenza Izzo, Ariel Levy, Daryl Sabara, Kirby Bliss Blanton
Plot: In New York, college student Justine joins a group of activists led by Alejandro and travels to Peru to protest against a timber industry that is destroying the Amazon rain forest. When the group is returning to civilization, the plane blows-up and crashes into the forest. Soon the survivors discover that they are not alone and they are abducted by a tribe of cannibals.
Production: Worldview Entertainment, Sobras International Pictures, Dragonfly Entertainment
